Welcome to the options menu of my plugin :)
This is where you find all the options that kinda have to exist, but shouldn't be in your way on the main interface.
Click on the nav tabs to navigate to the different pages!

Knobs: Click/Drag/Mousewheel Hold Shift Press Ctrl Right Click

Right Click
(B): Drag/Mousewheel

_ Modify parameter value. Sensitive parameter changes. Back to default value. Additional parameter options.
_ Modify macro parameter's modulation depth relative to its parameter value. Switch to bias-control.
_ Bias macro parameter's influence on the parameter. Switch to mod-depth-control.

I always wanted to become a VST Developer. Thanks to everyone who makes this possible.

txt.text:
Hi,
my name is Florian Mrugalla and I am now making beats since I was a child. VST is a technology owned by Steinberg, their trademark. But it's actually much more than that. VST plugins enable us to come together and engage in passionate discussions and they mangage to throw us into deep transcendental moments of trance on a regular basis.
That is why I consider VST a lifestyle!
I always wanted to make my own VST plugins and here I am! Let's go on a journey together with my creations now.
:)
